column1: '''''Essays Presented to Charles Williams''''' is a collection of six articles by friends of [[Charles Williams]], written to present to him on his leaving Oxford, but published to honour his death in 1945.
[[J.R.R. Tolkien]] contributed his "[[On Fairy-Stories]]" (pp. 38-89) essay, which appeared here in print for the first time.
*[[Dorothy Sayers]]: "'... And Telling you a Story': A Note on ''The Divine Comedy''"

column2: A.O. Barfield]]: "Poetic Diction and Legal Fiction"

column1: *[[Gervase Mathew]]: "Marriage and ''Amour Courtois'' in Late-Fourteenth-Century England"
